name: Ultra Potion
description: all party members; full HP recovery

name: Panacea
description: all party members; cure abnormal status

name: Ultra Cure
description: all party members; cure abnormal status and full HP recovery

name: Mega Phoenix
description: all party members; revive from K.O. with half HP

name: Final Phoenix
description: all party members; revive from K.O. with full HP

name: Elixir
description: one party member; full HP and MP recovery

name: Mega Elixir
description: all party members; full HP and MP recovery

name: Super Elixir
description: all party members; cure abnormal status and full HP

name: Final Elixir
description: all party members; cure abnormal status, partial HP and MP recovery, and revive from K.O. with partial HP
